title: Sony acquires Bungie, developers of Destiny series, for $3.6 billion
content:
Microsoft rocked the gaming world earlier this month when the company revealed it was purchasing game publisher Activision Blizzard for a whopping $68.7 billion. description: Sony is purchasing Bungie, developers of the Destiny series and the creators of Halo, for a reported $3.6 billion.
